title: black screen after champion selection
body: I have the issue that when i finish the champion selection, i went to black screen, and i can't play. This issue last after 6.15 update. Does anyone have ides?{{champion:32}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Black screens after champion select most commonly happen when there's an issue with your connection to the server. This can be caused by incompatible local network configurations or an issue along your route to the server. Our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over the first steps to take in troubleshooting this.

Should you still encounter issues after taking the steps provided, let me know.

A workaround for the Failed to Connect error after the Champ select is to wait on the black screen until you see the error pop up or hear the sound if it is in the background. Do not press retry or cancel just press Esc to close the error message then on the League window you should see a box with the option to Reconnect. Use this to try to reconnect to the game instead. May take a couple tries.
